settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Sign up to be the first to access new styles AND for 10% off your order.

settings.title: Be the first to access new styles!
settings.text: Enjoy 10% off your order when you sign up for our newsletter.

Melita, (pictured here with her kids) designed the first set of socks for her baby boy. A pair that was gentle on his skin and helped resolve his eczema.

Every pair of our seamless toe socks and tights is made from GOTS certified organic cotton, and produced in OEKO-Tex-100 certified facilities to ensure the absence of harmful chemicals and toxins found in a shocking 90% of baby and kids socks.

We strive to create products that are healthy and comfortable. Products that are gentle on our skin and on our planet.

settings.title: We sweat about the details. So you don't have to.
settings.text:
As moms, we are adamant about the little details. Little details matter. They make the difference between our kids even wearing socks or slipping and falling on our hardwood floors. 

We've removed everything that gets in the way of comfort and safety - from annoying toe seams to grips that actually don't grip. 

We sweat the details so you don't have to.

settings.title: Good for you. Good for our communities.
settings.text: The impact of your purchase:

settings.text_1: From product to packaging, materials are chosen to minimize the impact we have on our environment - #thereisnoplanetB
settings.text_2: Workers are paid fair wages and cared for at our GOTS and OEKO-Tex Standard 100 suppliers in Portugal and Sri Lanka
settings.text_3: We reach some of the world's most vulnerable children, through Mary's Meals and our 1 pair = 1 meal initiative. To date we have donated close to 18,000 meals. Learn more here.

settings.heading: FREE pair of socks

settings.label: Shop Now

settings.title: We create HAPPY and HEALTHY products that are gentle on our skin and our planet.
settings.text:
It all started with a desire to create a pair of seamless socks for a baby with eczema.

It continues with an unwavering focus to create healthy organic products that are soft and safe for your family.
